description:
Jesse and Zack discovered the wisdom of Kabbalah after many years of searching in all the wrong places for fulfillment. Here they share experiences and insight with you so that you can discover the secrets of the universe and benefit from having access to the true key to happiness in this world. 

Our course will help you understand that you can reach your full human potential by connecting properly with others. You can understand everything that is going on in the world and contribute to creating a sustainable society.

This is a short introductory course for anyone searching for meaning. You should take this course if filling yourself with all the usual things no longer gives you as much pleasure and if you feel you want more out of life.
title: What does Kabbalah teach us?
